steps.description: To start sorting out this problem, smoothly swap the letter e at slot 3 with the character r at index 2.
Robotically trade the letter ' at slot 4 with the letter r at location 3.
At this time, roughly swap the symbol  at slot 6 with the letter r at index 4.
The next step is to gently switch the symbol a at 7 with the letter s at slot 5.
Carefully swap the  at 8 with the letter r at position 6.
Carefully exchange the glyph b at index 12 with the symbol s at index 7.
Forcefully switch the letter l at position 13 with the glyph r at index 8.
Swiftly substitute the e at slot 14 with the glyph p at position 9.
Carefully substitute the m at position 15 with the r at location 10.
Continuing, roughly switch the character ' at index 3 with the letter h at location 0.
With that done, robotically trade the  at position 4 with the glyph e at index 1.
Gently trade the symbol a at position 5 with the letter e at index 2.
Right here, authentically swap the  at 6 with the h at position 3.
Algorithmically interchange the b at location 7 with the symbol e at 4.
At this time, forcefully switch the letter e at position 9 with the glyph e at position 5.
Continuing, gently exchange the character b at index 4 with the letter b at index 4.
Gently swap the glyph  at position 3 with the glyph ' at slot 0.
Forcefully exchange the glyph ' at index 3 with the symbol a at 2.
Smoothly interchange the letter e at slot 9 with the letter h at index 6.
Gently exchange the symbol h at position 9 with the letter l at position 8.
Robotically exchange the glyph p at index 14 with the s at 12.
At this point, mechanically interchange the letter r at position 15 with the symbol r at 13.
Curiously trade the letter p at location 12 with the glyph p at slot 12.
And now finally, carefully substitute the symbol r at location 15 with the letter s at location 14.
